languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится, силясь разглядеть что-то расфокусированными глазами. Наконец, потерев их, он впивается взглядом в стоящую за вашей спиной Ирлиэт.{/n} "{name}... у меня галлюцинации, или ксенос, что обрекла всех нас на этот кошмар, вновь в твоей свите?" {n}В голосе дознавателя звенит разгорающееся бешенство.{/n}

{n}Heinrix squints, struggling to see anything through his unfocused eyes. He finally rubs them and turns his gaze to Yrliet standing behind you.{/n} "{name}... Am I hallucinating or is the xenos who consigned us to this nightmare back in your retinue?" {n}The Interrogator's voice vibrates with incandescent rage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится, силясь разглядеть что-то расфокусированными глазами. Наконец, потерев их, он впивается взглядом в стоящую за вашей спиной Ирлиэт.{/n} "{name}... у меня галлюцинации, или ксенос, что обрекла всех нас на этот кошмар, вновь в твоей свите?" {n}В голосе дознавателя звенит разгорающееся бешенство.{/n}

Am I hallucinating or is the xenos who consigned us to this nightmare back in your retinue?" {n}The Interrogator's voice rings with incandescent rage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは目を細め、焦点の定まらない目で見ようとする。彼はようやく目をこすり、あなたの後ろに立っているユリエットに視線を向ける。{/n}「{name}…俺は幻覚を見ているのか、それとも俺たちをこの悪夢に追いやった異種族があなたの従者として戻ってきたのか？」{n}インテロゲイターの声は熱い怒りに震えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix squints, struggling to see anything through his unfocused eyes. He finally rubs them and turns his gaze to Yrliet standing behind you.{/n} "{name}... Am I hallucinating or is the xenos who consigned us to this nightmare back in your retinue?" {n}The Interrogator's voice vibrates with incandescent rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは目を細め、焦点の定まらない目で見ようとする。彼はようやく目をこすり、あなたの後ろに立っているユリエットに視線を向ける。{/n}「{name}…俺は幻覚を見ているのか、それとも俺たちをこの悪夢に追いやった異種族があなたの従者として戻ってきたのか？」{n}インテロゲイターの声は熱い怒りに震えている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希眯起眼睛，挣扎着调整着他失焦的眼睛。到最后，他揉揉眼睛，将目光转向站在你身后的伊莉耶特。{/n}“{name}……是我眼睛花了吗？还是说，让我们陷入这场噩梦之中的那个异形，就在你的随行人员之中？”{n}他的声音充满了无法掩饰的愤怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix squints, struggling to see anything through his unfocused eyes. He finally rubs them and turns his gaze to Yrliet standing behind you.{/n} "{name}... Am I hallucinating or is the xenos who consigned us to this nightmare back in your retinue?" {n}The Interrogator's voice vibrates with incandescent rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希眯起眼睛，挣扎着调整着他失焦的眼睛。到最后，他揉揉眼睛，将目光转向站在你身后的伊莉耶特。{/n}“{name}……是我眼睛花了吗？还是说，让我们陷入这场噩梦之中的那个异形，就在你的随行人员之中？”{n}他的声音充满了无法掩饰的愤怒。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix entrecierra los ojos, luchando por ver algo con sus ojos desenfocados. Finalmente se los frota y dirige la mirada hacia Yrliet, que está detrás de ti.{/n} «{name}... ¿Estoy alucinando o la xenos que nos envió a esta pesadilla vuelve a formar parte de su séquito?». {n}La voz del Interrogador vibra con rabia incandescente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix squints, struggling to see anything through his unfocused eyes. He finally rubs them and turns his gaze to Yrliet standing behind you.{/n} "{name}... Am I hallucinating or is the xenos who consigned us to this nightmare back in your retinue?" {n}The Interrogator's voice vibrates with incandescent rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix entrecierra los ojos, luchando por ver algo con sus ojos desenfocados. Finalmente se los frota y dirige la mirada hacia Yrliet, que está detrás de ti.{/n} «{name}... ¿Estoy alucinando o la xenos que nos envió a esta pesadilla vuelve a formar parte de su séquito?». {n}La voz del Interrogador resuena con rabia incandescente.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kneift die Augen zusammen, um zu versuchen, irgendetwas zu erkennen. Schließlich reibt er sie und blickt zu Yrliet, die hinter dir steht.{/n} "{name} ... Halluziniere ich oder ist der Xenos, der uns zu diesem Albtraum verdammt hat, wieder Teil Eures Gefolges?" {n}Die Stimme des Interrogators zittert vor feurigem Zorn.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix squints, struggling to see anything through his unfocused eyes. He finally rubs them and turns his gaze to Yrliet standing behind you.{/n} "{name}... Am I hallucinating or is the xenos who consigned us to this nightmare back in your retinue?" {n}The Interrogator's voice vibrates with incandescent rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kneift die Augen zusammen, um zu versuchen, irgendetwas zu erkennen. Schließlich reibt er sie und blickt zu Yrliet, die hinter dir steht.{/n} "{name} ... Halluziniere ich oder ist der Xenos, der uns zu diesem Albtraum verdammt hat, wieder Teil Eures Gefolges?" {n}Die Stimme des Interrogators dröhnt vor strahlendem Zorn.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix plisse les yeux, luttant visiblement pour distinguer quoi que ce soit. Il finit par les frotter et tourne le regard vers Yrliet qui se tient à vos côtés.{/n} « {name}... Est-ce que je rêve, ou est-ce que la xénos responsable de notre situation actuelle fait de nouveau partie de votre entourage ? » {n}demande-t-il d'une voix tremblant d'une fureur incandescente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix squints, struggling to see anything through his unfocused eyes. He finally rubs them and turns his gaze to Yrliet standing behind you.{/n} "{name}... Am I hallucinating or is the xenos who consigned us to this nightmare back in your retinue?" {n}The Interrogator's voice vibrates with incandescent rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix plisse les yeux, luttant visiblement pour distinguer quoi que ce soit. Il finit par les frotter et tourne le regard vers Yrliet qui se tient à vos côtés.{/n} « {name}... Est-ce que je rêve, ou est-ce que la xénos responsable de notre situation actuelle fait de nouveau partie de votre entourage ? » {n}demande-t-il d'une voix tremblant d'une fureur incandescente.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, gözlerini kısıp bulanık gözleriyle bir şeyler görmeye çalışıyor. Nihayet gözlerini ovuşturunca arkanda duran Yrliet'e bakışlarını dikiyor.{/n} "{name}... Ben mi hayal görüyorum yoksa başımıza bu çorabı ören zeno, maiyetine mi dönmüş?" {n}Sorgucu'nun sesi öfkeden titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix squints, struggling to see anything through his unfocused eyes. He finally rubs them and turns his gaze to Yrliet standing behind you.{/n} "{name}... Am I hallucinating or is the xenos who consigned us to this nightmare back in your retinue?" {n}The Interrogator's voice vibrates with incandescent rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, gözlerini kısıp bulanık gözleriyle bir şeyler görmeye çalışıyor. Nihayet gözlerini ovuşturunca arkanda duran Yrliet'e bakışlarını dikiyor.{/n} "{name}... Ben mi hayal görüyorum, yoksa başımıza bu çorabı ören zeno yine maiyetine mi dönmüş?" {n}Öfkeden Sorgucu'nun sesi titriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
